Posts.EditableText: Hello everyone. Now YouTube is blocking those videos that illegally use music in their videos. Therefore, I now have to carefully approach the choice of music on my YouTube channel. From Royalty-free Video Game to any song. Share where do you download songs and sounds?
Posts.HTML: Hello everyone. Now YouTube is blocking those videos that illegally use music in their videos. Therefore, I now have to carefully approach the choice of music on my YouTube channel. From Royalty-free Video Game to any song. Share where do you download songs and sounds?

Posts.EditableText:
[Open Game Art](https://opengameart.org/). I used to frequent Jamendo, too, but it's changed. [Dogmazic](https://dogmazic.net/) appears to be a spiritual successor.

P.S. Dear admins, please fix the reCaptcha 'cause it's getting almost impossible to post here.

Posts.EditableText:
There's a thread in this forum from a member who's made an awful lot of royalty free music. It surprised me once when I recognise his work in a commercial game :p

However, I suspect the OP is a spambot.
